Title: 🎬 For energy workers, a full-scale war began on February 22, 202...
Description: For energy workers, a full-scale war began on February 22, 2022. It was on this day that the Luhansk TPP in the city of Shchastya turned into hell. Shelling, fires, destruction... but the will is not broken. The Ukrainian flag will definitely return to every temporarily occupied power plant. It's only a matter of time. Let's persevere. We will win 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 🕯 Nikopol: a DTEK energy engineer was killed during the shell...
Description: 🕯Nikopol: a DTEK energy engineer was killed during Russian shelling. A great tragedy for the entire family of Ukrainian energy workers. Yesterday, the Russian occupiers killed our colleague Gennadiy Musatov. Together with the brigade, Gennadiy came to restore power grids damaged by shelling. The occupiers fired a second artillery strike and hit a mobile crane driven by our colleague. Gennady Musatov was 56 years old, 20 of which he devoted to the profession of energy. There are no words to describe the pain. Deep condolences to relatives, friends, colleagues, everyone who knew and loved Gennady. Eternal and bright memory to everyone who died during the battle for light...

Title: 🖼 💡Odeszine: DTEK energy workers restored critical infrastructu...
Description: 💡Odeszine: DTEK energy workers restored critical infrastructure and 40,000 families after the night attack Despite extremely difficult conditions, we managed to restore power supply to critical infrastructure in South Odesa. Now utility colleagues will be able to provide heat to homes throughout the day. We also restored electricity to 40,000 families. Emergency repair works are ongoing. We are doing everything possible to stabilize the situation as soon as possible ⚡️The battle for light continues. Believe in energy workers!

Title: 🖼 ❗️Odeschia: the Russian Federation again attacked the DTEK fac...
Description: ❗️Odeschia: the Russian Federation attacked the DTEKVorog facility again. The energy terror of Odeschia continues for the second night in a row. During the massive attack, the DTEK energy facility was attacked again. As soon as the energy workers receive permission from the military and rescuers, they will immediately start inspecting the equipment and emergency recovery work. The battle for light continues 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 💔 Odesa is under a terrible blow again... We are with you. We...

Title: 🖼 💡Odeszine: the enemy attacked the energy facility DTEK On the...
Description: 💡Odesshchyna: the enemy attacked the DTEK energy facility. On the night of February 18, the enemy once again attacked the Odesa region. Some homes in Odesa and the Odesa district remained without electricity. In the morning, power companies restored power to almost 15,000 families, restoring them from backup lines where possible. As soon as the energy workers receive permission from the rescuers, they will begin to eliminate the consequences of the attack. The priority is the restoration of power supply for critical infrastructure, including thermal facilities. ❗️Repair works will continue around the clock until the light returns to every home of Odessa residents and residents of the region. The battle for light continues. Believe in energy workers 🇺🇦

Description: 💪DTEK restores the light: in the last week, we managed to restore electricity supply to almost 200,000 families after shelling by the Russian occupiers. In particular, for the residents of Sloviansk, Kramatorsk, Druzhkivka, and Kostiantynivka, who were left without electricity due to the attack of the occupiers on February 8. Let's stand and win!

Title: 🎬 Is there a shortage of coal in Ukraine? Actually no. On the co...
Description: Is there a shortage of coal in Ukraine? Actually, no. On the contrary, coal reserves are currently the largest in the last 20 years. Since the beginning of this year, DTEK launched two new coal mining sites, the so-called coal mines. In total, last year the company invested 7.5 billion hryvnias in coal mining. Title: 🎬 💡 Why do we have light? The secret is obvious — it is the rou...
Description: 💡 Why do we have light? The secret is obvious — it is the round-the-clock titanic work of energy workers. In 2024, DTEK repaired and updated more than 14,000 km of lines and 6,000 energy facilities — 80% more than in 2023. The company spent UAH 4.5 billion to ensure that the energy system was stable even in the face of unprecedented attacks in world history .The battle for light continues. Let's stand and win! ⚡ Video is too big
